extendedInfo.description: The revolution is here! From now on, you don't have to pay in order to study theory, you just have to install one simple app to your smartphone, and study.Now you can study whenever you want, wherever you want, for free!This application provides two methods to study:1)Theory ExercisingIn this method, the application will give you a loop of questions, which you will answer, and the answer will be shown immediately.2)Theory TestIn this method, the application will simulate an actual theory test, whice means you've got 40 minutes to answer 30 questions, with only up to 4 mistakes. At the end of the test, you'll be able to see if you've passed or faild, and where you have been wrong.In the intial run of the application you will have to wait a few seconds till the app load the questions database.We hope this app will help you to pass the theory test succesfully, and if it did, we'll be very happy to recive a good feedback.Enjoy.

reviews.title: Amazing-some glitches
reviews.comment: Its amazing really helps...some glitches and spelling mistakes.
reviews.author: Gershy Rapp

reviews.title: Great Practice!
reviews.comment: I passed on my first try thanks to this app! There are a few spelling mistakes in the questions and answers, but they\'re understandable
reviews.author: Lt. Rex

reviews.title: Passed with this app!
reviews.comment: The questions are exactly the same as the actual test. Just memorise the answers here and you\'ll be set! My only minor complaint is the occasional mistranslation - indicator is referred to as the \'winker\' ;) I\'d be happy to help with any proofing if you\'d like!
reviews.author: Jordan Tanner
